data.title: SUBSCRIPTION SCAM WARNING
data.content: Advertised as a 7-day free trial but was charged for a full year subscription on the same day of download. Immediately deleted the app and filed a dispute but did not receive a refund. No way to contact the app maker directly for a refund. Complete scam to take your money! DO NOT DOWNLOAD

data.title: Getting progressively worse‚Ä¶
data.content: I‚Äôve been using this app for quite a while now, maybe a year. I enjoyed it at first, but it seems with every update they are removing more and more features from the free version. I‚Äôm a college student, and I simply do not have the spare income for a subscription. They are limiting the backgrounds, the customization of the affirmations (and the rest of the app), and now have even taken away the ‚Äúpractice‚Äù option, something I used nearly every day. Unfortunately this is a common occurrence with supposedly free apps. I‚Äôm not sure how much longer this one will be of use to me. The setup is user friendly, the affirmations are unique and really boosted my self esteem. It was very helpful during a hard time in my life, but I no longer think this is beneficial the way it used to be.

data.author: UniqueLemur8444

data.title: ‚ÄúMake an account‚Äù feature is not a secure way to save data
data.content: I have used this app for about a year and a half. I have been a premium subscriber for most of that . This fall they came out with the feature to make an account instead of having all your data just saved on your phone. When I did that, I lost hundreds of custom affirmations and collections that I had made for different occasions in my life. Over a month ago, I informed the development team about this and followed up a couple weeks later, and I have received no support or feedback on whether or when they can get my account info restored. I wish I had never created an account at all because when I deleted the app and reinstalled it to see if that would fix some of the bugs, I lost almost everything. It seems that every time an update is released the past few months, there are issues and bugs. I wish the developers would work out these bugs before releasing new updates. But I am still a user and subscriber, and it is a very helpful app. Just I want to warn people to maybe make a back up of your affirmations in another app or journal and do not count on them being safe in your I Am account.

data.title: So far so good
data.content:
I like these affirmations for the most part but am frustrated with a few things already

-after clicking don‚Äôt want/don‚Äôt believe in manifestation i am still getting them. With my mental health i have to be careful around spiritual/manifestation phrases

-no option to say i am physically disabled so im assuming i can‚Äôt get affirmations revolving around that. Which is very unfortunate. It also makes the manifestation affirmations that pop up feel more bitter than anything. I don‚Äôt need affirmations on how i can do anything i want, i would like affirmations to be okay with my limits and my body, and be taking things at my own pace. There‚Äôs some things people will never be able to do. Thats just a fact, not negativity. Realist gentle affirmations with disabled people in mind should be a filter you can click and opt in to from the very beginning.

data.author: helloloveyby

data.title: Bad algorithm
data.content: I pay for the subscription and have used the app for a couple years now, but the past few months I‚Äôve noticed that if I like a certain affirmation, basically the same affirmation shows up repeatedly just worded a slightly different way, and it‚Äôs not just once or twice. Every affirmation after the one I hearted will basically be the exact same one I hearted and it‚Äôs super annoying! I have specific categories I love and use those in addition to the ‚Äúgeneral‚Äù category, I have the ones I want in my rotation liked so I would expect that affirmations would rotate through most of those categories but they don‚Äôt do that anymore. It‚Äôs become such a nuisance that I eventually close out of the app altogether after only a minute or two at most. I pay for this app because I used to love the variety of affirmations I would receive so I could expand my horizons and figure out what is challenging for me, please go back to the old algorithm or find a way to fix it, otherwise I will be stopping my use of the subscription altogether.
